keywords.term: Heraclides of Lembos; Hermippus; Epitome of Hermippus the Peripatetic, De legislatoribus 1 + 2; de septem sapientibus; de Pythagora; with title

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - L.12 ᾤχε[το] iota adscript, L. 12. καταδ̣ι̣κ̣ασθεὶς no underdot below kappa, L.13 <:ἐπ̣[ω]λεῖτο||alt||ἐτ[έ]λει τὸ|ἐπώλει τὸ:> -> |ed|, L.15,19,46 paragraphos between the lines, L.17 ου\ι/ -> ο[[υ]]\ἵ/, L.19 συνέπεσεν· -> νσυνέπεσεν·*high-punctus*, L.21 νέων·*high-punctus*, L.29 προ[σνείμας] -> [προ]σνείμας, L.31 [ιν.3]-> [ιν][.3], L.32-3: ]κουν underdot below κ, the supplement does not appear in Gallo 1975, L.34 ἑξ ὧν underdot below ξω, L.36 και -> καὶ, L.37 Μαν[τ]ινέων ->Μαν[τ]ινέ[ων], L.39 νο`μ̣[ο]´θ[ετ]ής -> νο\μ̣[ο]/θ[ετ]ής, L.40 β̄ -> <#¯δ¯=4#>, L.41 ]η underdot, L. 44 φασι,*high-punctus*, col.2: maintain line-numbers of editions, L.32,35,36 paragraphos between the lines, L.33 α̣ν̣ι̣κ̣η̣σ̣[ no underdot below ny, L.34 Βουζύγης*high-punctus*, L.35 σαι·*high-punctus*, α[ὑτοῦ] lenis, L.37 Ἁρχ̣ίμαχον̣ lenis, L.38 Gallo 1975 supplies καὶ, L.39 Gallo 1975 agrees with Grenfell-Hunt, L.43 [.?]ε ->[.0-1]ε, ο̣[.?]->ο̣[.1], L.44 lacunae [.0-1], [.0-1], L.45 beginning [.0-1], L.47 τετ̣ρακοσίους·*high-punctus*, Fr.2 add horizontal lines, Fr. 4 add lacuna at line ends, Fr.6 [.?]ν[.?] -> [.?].1ν[.?]

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - L.12 ᾤχε[το] iota adscript, L. 12. καταδ̣ι̣κ̣ασθεὶς no underdot below kappa, L.13 <:ἐπ̣[ω]λεῖτο||alt||ἐτ[έ]λει τὸ|ἐπώλει τὸ:> -> |ed|, L.15,19,46 paragraphos between the lines, L.17 ου\ι/ -> ο[[υ]]\ἵ/, L.19 συνέπεσεν· -> νσυνέπεσεν·*high-punctus*, L.21 νέων·*high-punctus*, L.29 προ[σνείμας] -> [προ]σνείμας, L.31 [ιν.3]-> [ιν][.3], L.32-3: ]κουν underdot below κ, the supplement does not appear in Gallo 1975, L.34 ἑξ ὧν underdot below ξω, L.36 και -> καὶ, L.37 Μαν[τ]ινέων ->Μαν[τ]ινέ[ων], L.39 νο`μ̣[ο]´θ[ετ]ής -> νο\μ̣[ο]/θ[ετ]ής, L.40 β̄ -> <#¯δ¯=4#>, L.41 ]η underdot, L. 44 φασι,*high-punctus*, col.2: maintain line-numbers of editions, L.32,35,36 paragraphos between the lines, L.33 α̣ν̣ι̣κ̣η̣σ̣[ no underdot below ny, L.34 Βουζύγης*high-punctus*, L.35 σαι·*high-punctus*, α[ὑτοῦ] lenis, L.37 Ἁρχ̣ίμαχον̣ lenis, L.38 Gallo 1975 supplies καὶ, L.39 Gallo 1975 agrees with Grenfell-Hunt, L.43 [.?]ε ->[.0-1]ε, ο̣[.?]->ο̣[.1], L.44 lacunae [.0-1], [.0-1], L.45 beginning [.0-1], L.47 τετ̣ρακοσίους·*high-punctus*, Fr.2 add horizontal lines, Fr. 4 add lacuna at line ends, Fr.6 [.?]ν[.?] -> [.?].1ν[.?]
Submit - I am working on Philochorus' papyrological fragments, including P. Oxy. XI 1367, for my Ph.D. thesis.
